title: Maximizing the Value of Your Data

questions.question: Which kind of platform is FME?
options: Data governance
Blockchain
Customer relationship management (CRM)
Data integration

questions.question: Which of the following is not an example of a data silo?
options: AutoCAD drawing datasets stored on a single CAD technician’s computer.
Excel files of budgeted financial statements stored on a network drive shared by a few members of an Accounting department.
An asset management system with data only accessible by members of the facilities management team.
All the spatial data used by an organization stored in a single cloud database, integrated with other systems where necessary.

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of spatial data?
options: An inventory management system database.
Employee work schedules in a spreadsheet.
Salesperson service areas as polygons.
PDF versions of quarterly financial reports.

questions.question: Which of the following scenarios doesn’t require spatial data integration?
options: A fast-food chain needs to find an optimal location for a new restaurant.
A construction company needs to automatically email invoices to its customers.
A local government needs to track the locations of graffiti reports to efficiently dispatch removal crews.
A weather network needs to provide customers with real-time notifications of lightning strikes, including coordinates.

questions.question: Which of the following spatial datasets is most likely to be stored using a raster format?
options: Aerial photographs of a dam site.
A road network with attributes such as the name of the street.
The location of fire halls.
The boundaries between counties within a state.
